text: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.4.1 Write opinion pieces on topics or texts, supporting a point of view with reasons and information.

children.text: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.4.1.a Introduce a topic or text clearly, state an opinion, and create an organizational structure in which related ideas are grouped to support the writer's purpose.
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.4.1.b Provide reasons that are supported by facts and details.
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.4.1.c Link opinion and reasons using words and phrases (e.g., for instance , in order to , in addition ).
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.4.1.d Provide a concluding statement or section related to the opinion presented.
